name: Family Trouble
description:
There was a happy family with two sons a father and a mother. Everything was fine until the youngest brother suddenly became hostile. At first it wasn't that bad and they just pretended to be normal. But after a few month it became worse and worse. It even got so bad that he wanted to fight against everyone who got near him. The oldest brother was afraid decided to disappear and left the family. He began to travel across the country. After a few years of traveling and staying the night in a B&B something horrible happen.

I hope you like the story and if you have suggestions for changes please leave a comment. Also give the game a follow if you want to see the final result.
